meanings.definition: A Welsh festival of literature, music, and performance.
meanings.sent1: The local community organized an eisteddfod to celebrate Welsh culture.
meanings.sent2: Every year, the town hosts an eisteddfod to showcase local talent.
meanings.sent3: At the eisteddfod, the poetry competition was so intense that even the birds stopped chirping to listen.
meanings.sent4: The eisteddfod was a colorful tapestry of words, melodies, and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The eisteddfod transported me to a magical realm where creativity knows no bounds.

meanings.definition: A competition or festival of Welsh poetry and music.
meanings.sent1: The eisteddfod featured traditional Welsh songs and heartfelt poems.
meanings.sent2: Participants eagerly awaited the results of the eisteddfod.
meanings.sent3: During the eisteddfod, the poets' words danced like musical notes in the air.
meanings.sent4: The eisteddfod was a symphony of artistic expressions.
meanings.sent5: The eisteddfod was a harmonious blend of lyrical beauty and melodic charm.

meanings.definition: A gathering of Welsh poets and musicians.
meanings.sent1: The eisteddfod brought together talented poets and musicians from across Wales.
meanings.sent2: In the cozy hall, the eisteddfod participants shared their creative works.
meanings.sent3: The eisteddfod turned into a lively jam session with poets and musicians collaborating spontaneously.
meanings.sent4: The eisteddfod was a vibrant mosaic of artistic souls united in creativity.
meanings.sent5: The eisteddfod buzzed with the energy of passionate wordsmiths and melodious minstrels.
